song.title: All you need is love
song.tags: ann cover karaoke rayearth ova anime
song.lyrics: Nagareteyuku marude maboroshii no you ni [java] Kasai no milky way kugurinukeru made [java] Donna toki mo kimi ga soba ni itte kureta [java] Kyou no namida wa eien no hokori [java] [java] Wakare ga kanashikute [java] hodokenai [java] toki wo tomete~~ [java] [java] All you need is love.. [java] shinjiteru yume miru no chikara [java] te wo nobashi
